2.「扉の封印 解けた……？: The seal on the door is broken...?

3.「ふむ。すべての像が 解放されて| 最後の 封印が解けたようじゃな……。: Hmm. It seems that all the statues have been|freed and the last seal has been broken...

7.「ほら見ろよ クラウン！| やっぱり ウェスリーは生きてるじゃねぇか！？: Look at that, Crown! I knew Wesley was alive!

8.「さっきの 残留思念は やっぱり| 誰かの仕組んだ ニセモノだったんだな！: The residual thoughts I had just now were a|fake, orchestrated by someone, after all!

10.「やっと 会えたな……。| 本当に 心配かけさせやがって……。: It's so nice to finally meet you... you're|really starting to worry me...

12.「まあ こうして 無事に会えたんだから| いいけどな。あんまり 心配かけんなよ。: Well, it's good that we met safely like this.|Don't worry too much.

15.「どうして 封印を解いちゃうんだよ！！: Why would you break the seal!

16.「なんでって お前を助けるために| 決まってるだろ……？: Why? Because I'm trying to help you, of|course...?

17.「また 隠れ場所を探さなきゃ……| あいつに 見つかる前に！: I have to find a place to hide again... before|he finds me!

20.「遺跡に入り込んでいた| 侵入者には 逃げられてしまったか……。: The intruder who had entered the ruins must|have escaped...

22.「いや。湖の 赤い光が 消えたものでね。| もしやと思い 来てみたが……。| や:
No. The red light in the lake disappeared. I|came here to see if it was possible, but... it|seems that all the seals on the intruder have|
|been broken after all.

23.「諸君。すこし 下がっていてくれたまえ……。: Gentlemen. I'm gonna have to ask you to step|back a little bit...

25.「オレたちが せっかく 封印を解いたのに。| また封印しちゃうんだ？: We've already broken the seal. You're going to|seal it again?

26.「ここは 開け放しておくには| 少々 危険が過ぎる所でね……。: It's a little too dangerous to leave this|place open.

27.「いずれにせよ 君たちに依頼していた| 遺跡探索は これにて完了だ。: In any case, the search for the ruins that I|have requested of you is now complete.

28.「みんな よくやってくれた。| 状況を説明するために ひとまず| 場所を 対策室: You all did a great job. Let's move to the|strategy room for the time being to explain|the situation.

32.「よーし 出やがったな！ | ウェスリーが 待ってるかもしれねェんだ。| さっさ: Well, there you go! Wesley might be waiting|for you. Get the hell out of here!

36.「なんて迫力だ……。| これがあの シュメリアちゃんだってのかよ。: How powerful.... this is that Sumeria girl,|huh?

38.「これで あなたたちと全力で戦えるわ。: Now I can fight you guys with everything I've|got.

42.「願いのチカラを狙う 例の勢力から| 学園を守るため 招かれた エージェント同士: Both agents were invited to protect the school|from the power of the wish. The headmaster had|high hopes for us, but...

43.「私たちときたら ライバル心 むきだしで| ぶつかりあってばかりで| 最初のうち: We had a lot of rivalry, and we kept bumping|into each other, and in the beginning, all we|did was fail.

45.「おたがい オモテ向きの 仕事でしか| なかったはずの 生徒指導に 熱が入りすぎ:
The part where we both get so involved in|student-teaching that we forget about our|duties, which were only meant to be a public|
|service...

46.「いざとなると 向こう見ずに| 敵に 飛びかかっていく ところとか。| なんだか:
The way he would leap at his enemies without|looking over his shoulder when the situation|called for it. We were similar in some way,|
|weren't we?

47.「それが わかってからは 一気に打ち解けて。| 教師としても エージェントとして: Once we realized that, we instantly became|friends. As a teacher and as an agent... we've|come to really trust each other.

48.「でも…… そんな ふたりの関係も| 長くは 続かなかった……。: But... their relationship didn't last long.

49.「あの日 あなたは| 明らかに 様子がおかしかった……。: You were clearly acting strange that day...

50.「はげしい痛みに さいなまれているかのように| 苦しみだしたかと思うと…… かけ: As if in agony, he began to suffer from severe|pain... and as I ran over to him, he suddenly|swung his beloved axe at me.

51.「暴風のような斬撃を かわしながら| 必死に 説得を試みたけれど| あなたの耳に: I tried desperately to convince you, dodging|the slashes like a storm, but you didn't seem|to hear me.

52.「血走った目に宿る 殺気は 本物だった。| やらなければ やられる……| 私の戦: The murderous intent in his bloodshot eyes was|real. If I didn't do it, I would be beaten...|my warrior instincts told me so...

53.「混乱し 心は乱れていても 鍛えあげた| 戦闘の技術は 私を 裏切らなかったわ。: Confused and distracted in mind, my well-honed|combat skills did not fail me. I dodged a|slash on the spur of the moment, and I...

56.「それからの私は あえて| はげしい戦いの中に 身を置くことで| あの日のことを: From then on, I tried desperately to forget|that day by putting myself in the middle of|the fiercest battles.

57.「でも……剣を握るたびに あの時の感触が| よみがえってきて……。| もう 耐え: But... every time I hold the sword, the|feeling of that time comes back to me... and I|can't stand it anymore...

58.「私は 罪の意識から逃れるように……| この子を 湖の底に沈めた。: I drowned this child at the bottom of the lake|to escape my guilt.

59.「そして あなたの愛弟子が| 入学してもなお すべてを隠して| 自分の罪から 目: And even after your beloved student enrolled,|you continued to hide everything and turn a|blind eye to your own sins.

60.「でも……そんなことで 苦しみは消えなかった。: But... that didn't make the pain go away.

61.「だからね ザビアナ。| 私は もう 自分の罪から逃げずに| 自分のしたことと: So, Zaviana. I will no longer run from my|sins, but face up to what I've done.

64.「これで ウェスリーに 剣を渡してやれるな。: Now we can give Wesley the sword.
